reviews.text: Family of 4 stayed here in a two bedroom for 2 nights. Fully self catering including a washing machine and dryer. Quite dated but adequate with a very large kitchen incl full oven. The resort is at the back of the first block of shops and is 3 storeys high. Compared to some of the other Coolum locations the placement is not the best.
reviews.title: A lot of stairs to climb
